name: Marinara Sauce
recipeYield: Enough sauce for 1 pound of dried pasta; serves 3 to 4
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, garlic, herbs, tomato
recipeIngredient: 3 large cloves garlic, thinly sliced (see note)
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil. Add the garlic and brown lightly. Stir in the parsley and basil. Add the tomatoes and crush coarsely with the back of a fork. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste.
